[[1980â81 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1980â81]] |} At the end of 1979â80 season [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] has promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] for the third time. The [[1979â80 Turkish Second Football League|1979â80]] was the eighth season of [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) football team in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]], the second level division in [[Turkey]]. They finished 1st in Group A. They have lost second league championship game against [[Kocaelispor]] by penalities. ==1979â80 league participation== In its 17th season ([[1979â80 Turkish Second Football League|1979â80]]) [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] was played with 32 teams, 16 in two groups: Group A and Group B. Group winners promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] [[1980â81 Turkish First Football League|1980â81]]. Runner-ups played a promotion game to determine the third club to be promoted to first league. No teams relegated because next year second and third leagues merged and third league abandoned. Mersin Ä°Y became 1st in Group A with 17 wins and 38 goals. ===League table=== Mersin Ä°Y's league performance in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] Group A in [[1979â80 Turkish Second Football League|1979â80]] season is shown in the following tableSee full table and results from [http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/7980/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives]. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !rowspan=2|place !rowspan=2|team !colspan=4|games !colspan=2|goals !rowspan=2|points !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|home !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|away |- !
